metadataAttributes.Title: Human Resource Management: HR for People Managers Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Become a better manager of people. Develop strategies and skills for hiring, managing performance, and rewarding employees.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Performance Management, interviewing, Human Resources (HR), Onboarding, managing people, Resource Management, Hr Strategy, Recruiting, Recruitment, Performance Appraisal, Organizational Culture, Incentive,
metadataAttributes.Instructors: John W. Budd ,Amy Simon ,Stacy Doepner-Hove ,Larry Bourgerie ,Alan Benson ,Mike Davis ,
